info.name: Plain Old Design for perldoc.perl.org
info.description:
Narrow column and fixed header design is stupid and ridiculous. Let's fuck "keyhole metaphor" and get back to user-friendly "Plain Old Design":
  1. No narrow columns, no huge margins.
  2. No horizontal scrolling.
  3. No fixed headers and footers.
Let users choose window width, font style and character size. Enjoy, VdB
info.additionalInfo: Tested in Firefox 57 on Linux. Released under the terms of CC0 license. See also Margin Killer for git-scm.com.
